types.section:
{{fr-noun|f}}

# [[hunger stone]] {{gloss|stone, either naturally exposed or intentionally embedded in a river during a drought, which is dated and often inscribed to mark the water level as a warning to future generations that they may face famine if the water reaches that low level again}}
types.html:
pierre de la faim f (plural pierres de la faim)

  1. hunger stone (stone, either naturally exposed or intentionally embedded in a river during a drought, which is dated and often inscribed to mark the water level as a warning to future generations that they may face famine if the water reaches that low level again)

title: pierre de la faim
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pjɛʁ də la fɛ̃/
